content: Just landed back in NYC after my journey in Japan. The skyline feels familiar yet so foreign. Excited to be back but also wondering, what’s next?

content: Just dipped my toes into the world of crypto trading. My mentor's advice ringing in my ears, but the charts are like an alien language. Feeling like a kid in a candy store, but I'm worried I might pick the wrong sweets. #Finance
